cast.overview: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.
cast.title: Step Up

details.biography: A classically trained ballerina (The Washington Ballet, Dance Theatre of Harlem) with a well-rounded dance career working in commercials, feature films, live shows, and world tours! Credits include;  Lady Gaga, Taylor Swift, Robin Thicke, Cats the musical (Nat. Tour), Fame the musical, (Nat.Tour), Chicago the musical (Hollywood Bowl) So You Think You Can Dance, Dancing with the Stars, Selfie, Ted 2, Step Up, Gone with the Bullets, Gnomeo and Juliet, and Nike to name a few.  Melissa teaches and choreographs across the country!
details.name: Melissa Emrico
